data.prayer: Jesus, 984,400 people live in the state of Chaco. Please, give them 196 new simple churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chaco, Argentina
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 984,400 souls in Chaco and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 108,806 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Chaco.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Chaco, Argentina to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 875,594 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Spanish-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Spanish-speaking people.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Chaco.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Chaco, Argentina to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, help the 108,806 believers in Chaco to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests
